title: STUDY PLAN
content: The D3 Railway Transportation Management program aims to produce competent professionals in operational management and railway transportation management. This program combines transportation management theory with practical fieldwork, covering schedule planning, infrastructure management, and passenger and freight service management. Students are trained to understand railway transportation regulations and safety standards, as well as to utilize modern technology to enhance railway system efficiency. Graduates of this program possess relevant expertise to support the development of efficient, safe, and sustainable railway transportation.
